page.title: 05RESIDENTS' ASSOCIATION
page.content:
In 1978 a village meeting was held in Belmont to form a Residents Association.This continues to provide activities for the{community} .There are ten members on the committee.When the Residents Association first began all the events were better supported than they are now.Most of the{events take place in the village,using either the school or the Sailing Club.
Every year in Belmont Village there is a{fete}which is held on the park,organised by the Residents Association.This costs about five hundred pounds.It includes side shows, children's{sports}and various displays.A disco is held for all the village at the Sailing Club.The over sixties have a supper.
